Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850000, believing that this exceptional opportunity should not be overlooked. We understand that its true worth may be subjective, but we trust that you will appreciate its quality and significance. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
